price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߘߊ߲߫ ߟߊ߬ߕߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߞߏ߬ ߢߌߡߊ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: laqad khalaqnā al-insāna fī aḥsani taqwīmin
